query: SELECT id, name, duration, features FROM subscription_plans;
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user grt6LNSoYSrgVpD.root --database hyw6dNpPfwvMbAQcNaKZ5T --execute SELECT id, name, duration, features FROM subscription_plans;

rows.name: Monthly Plan
rows.features: ["Full software access", "Color detection", "Region selection", "Multi-monitor support", "Priority support"]

rows.name: Yearly Plan
rows.features: ["Full software access", "Color detection", "Region selection", "Multi-monitor support", "Priority support", "Free updates", "Best value"]

stdout:
id	name	duration	features
1	Weekly Plan	weekly	["Full software access", "Color detection", "Region selection", "Basic support"]
2	Monthly Plan	monthly	["Full software access", "Color detection", "Region selection", "Multi-monitor support", "Priority support"]
3	Yearly Plan	yearly	["Full software access", "Color detection", "Region selection", "Multi-monitor support", "Priority support", "Free updates", "Best value"]
